469f6fa574f6.bio: I am a pop-culture fanatic, a thinker who philosophizes with a big, scary hammer, and a master of profane erudition. When they go low, I go lower!
469f6fa574f6.name: The Real Jim Shady

76f21f3db847.bio: Pacific Coaster transplanted to North Carolina
76f21f3db847.name: Victoria Lamb Hatch

paragraphs.text: In a letter to his constituents, Rep. Louie Gohmert (R-TX) announced he won’t be holding an in-person town hall anytime soon because “there are groups from the more violent strains of the leftist ideology, some even being paid, who are preying on public town halls to wreak havoc and threaten public safety.”

virtuals.subtitle: Rep. Gohmert cites the Gabby Giffords shooting.

a8d70ba7cc87.title: Like John the Baptist prefigured Jesus Christ, Louie Gohmert prefigured Donald Trump.

paragraphs.text: Like John the Baptist prefigured Jesus Christ, Louie Gohmert prefigured Donald Trump. Gohmert is possibly the stupidest man in America today, having assembled a long track-record of idiotic statements, indefensible policies, and a life lived in an alternate universe. If Gohmert could be elected to public office (yes, even in Texas) then the Presidency of Donald J. Trump was inevitable.

paragraphs.text: Typical chicken shit republican. They can’t handle reality other than what benefits them. And in response to the public’s demands, they just offer nonsense statements that illustrates them to be complete idiots. 1950’s was 60 years ago but Republicans are stuck in that mentality.
